thread.section_title: Villa Opera Drouot - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Best Hotel
thread.title_full: Best Hotel - Review of Villa Opera Drouot, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: parthame8
title: Best Hotel
text:
Hotel is nice. Location is also good. Stuffs are very good. Nice room, well decorated full of red. Spending two days at hotel was like spending at own home. Breakfast was Incredible!! Overall fantastic services. I am pleased. Highly recommend this hotel for the travelers at reasonable price.
Room Tip: very quiet environment. See more room tips
